Yvonne Cherrie (nke a makwaara dịka Monalisa, a mụrụ n'August 19, 1981) bụ onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri. N'afọ 2010 ọ meriri Zanzibar International Film Festival maka onyinye 'Best Actress'. A họpụtakwara ya maka 2011 Nigeria Entertainment Awards maka Pan African Actress Of The Year A na-ekwu na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndi mbụ kachasị mma na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Tanzania. Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ntọala Act With Monalisa nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịtụzi na ịkwado ụmụ nwanyị Tanzania na-eto eto na nduzi ọrụ na ikpo okwu iji gosipụta nkà ha na onye nduzi nke African Women Arts and Film Festival (AWAFFEST).
A mụrụ Cherrie na August 19, 1981 na Muhimbili, ụlọ ọgwụ mba Tanzania
Nne ya, Suzan Lewis, bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri.

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Luanda, Angola ebe nna ya na-arụ ọrụ; o mechara laghachi Tanzania wee malite agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Muungano Primary School na Temeke, Dar Es Salaam ma nwee agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị na Zanaki Girls High School tupu ọ gawa Tanzania Public Service College ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ.

N'afọ 2002, ọ sonyeere British Council Tanzania for Pre Advance iji mụọ asụsụ Bekee, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ sonyeara Wilnag Media Training College na Nairobi ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma na nkwukọrịta ọha.

O nwetara aha njirimara ya bụ o sitere na arụmọrụ ya n'afọ 1998 dịka nwa agbọghọ, na-agba mbọ ime ka ndụ ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ ya n'anya dịghachi n'otu, na usoro Mambo Hayo N'afọ 2002, Monalisa mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Girlfriend ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Tumpale enyi nwanyị TID'S Tumpale onye a manyere ịgbanwe ndụ ya mgbe nna ya chụpụrụ ya
O mechara rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, dịka Sabrina (2003), Dilemma (2004), She Is My Sister (2006), Kwa Heshima Ya Penzi, Binti Nusa na Network

Otu n'ime ihe ngosi ya a ma ama sitere na Black Sunday nke mere ka o nweta onyinye 'Best Actress' maka 2010 Zanzibar International Film Festival na nhọpụta maka Pan African Actress of The year 2011 Nigeria Entertainment Awards.
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri: Jacob StevenJb), Single Mtambalike (Richie), Bishanga, Waridi na Cathy
Telivishọn: East Africa Television (EATV) na TV 1
